AccountTipoffAccess.document: 举报存在诈骗、违规、违法等行为的账号
AccountTipoffAccess.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AccountTipoffAccess
<公共请求参数>

{"ReportedAccount":"123456789","ReportedAccountType":2,"SenderAccount":"987654321","SenderAccountType":2,"SenderIP":"127.0.0.1","EvilType":1,"EvilContent":"王者代练，入会需交费，+q：123456789"}
AccountTipoffAccess.title: 账号举报
